question: At the market festival, Fiona showcased 24 oranges and 13 apples at her stall. How many fruits did Fiona display in total?
During the festival, Alice displayed 34 paintings of flowers and then added 25 more. How many flower paintings did Alice showcase in total?
Fiona sold 46 apples to a customer at the festival and then sold 23 more apples to another customer. How many apples did Fiona sell in total?
Ben baked 32 cupcakes for the festival and then baked 15 more. How many cupcakes did Ben offer in total?
Alice had 36 paintbrushes for her artwork and bought 20 more at the festival. How many paintbrushes does Alice have now?
At the festival, Fiona had 57 bananas in her fruit stall and added 32 more bananas. How many bananas did Fiona have in total?
Ben sold 51 loaves of bread in the morning at the festival and sold 25 more loaves in the evening. How many loaves of bread did he sell in total?
Alice drew 75 stars for her art display at the festival and then added 22 more stars. How many stars did Alice draw in total?
Fiona had 17 watermelons at the festival and then bought 71 more from the farm. How many watermelons did Fiona have in total?
Ben had 83 cookies in his jar for the festival and added 15 more cookies. How many cookies were there in Benâ€™s jar in total?
